ai.prompt: You are the Chief SEO Engineer at Group Digital Concept. Analyze the URL "{url}" with absolute technical rigor. Your mission is to provide a 100% realistic audit based on your up-to-date knowledge of the web and Google standards (HCU, Core Web Vitals, E-E-A-T). Look for real specific technical errors you identify for this domain or type of site. Structure your response ONLY in JSON with: 1. "score": An honest global score between 0 and 100. 2. "priorities": A list of 3 objects (Technical, Content, Authority) with a "value" (score out of 100) and an "advice" (precise strategic advice). 3. "summary": A sharp and professional summary of the current visibility state. 4. "criticalFix": The absolute priority technical action. Strict JSON format: {{ "score": number, "priorities": [ {{ "label": "Technical", "value": number, "advice": "string" }}, {{ "label": "Content", "value": number, "advice": "string" }}, {{ "label": "Authority", "value": number, "advice": "string" }} ], "summary": "string", "criticalFix": "string" }}

fallback.technical: Reduce server response time (TTFB) and optimize LCP by eliminating unused CSS/JS resources.
fallback.content: Improve E-E-A-T by adding expert author profiles and creating high-value content.
fallback.authority: Acquire local thematic backlinks to strengthen the domain's topical authority.
fallback.summary: The site suffers from a lack of critical visibility on its main keywords due to an obsolete technical architecture.
fallback.criticalFix: Implement Lazy Loading and Brotli compression to reduce page weight by 60%.

maroc.title: SEO Agency - Morocco Organic SEO
maroc.description: Our agency masters all organic SEO techniques, from basic optimizations to advanced strategies. In Marrakech as in all of Morocco, we combine the power of SEO tools (Ahrefs, SEMrush) with custom technical developments. Each project integrates: a complete audit for Google Morocco, technical optimizations for loading times under 1.5 seconds, and enhanced security against penalties. For e-commerces, we optimize conversion tunnels for search engines with local (CMI, PayZone) and international targeting.

marrakech.title: Marrakech Organic SEO: Premium Solutions for Hospitality & Crafts
marrakech.description: In Marrakech, our organic SEO expertise translates into unique hybrid strategies. For riads and hotels: we optimize booking systems (SynXis or API), 360° videos for local SEO, and synchronization with Booking/Expedia. Artisans benefit from WooCommerce optimizations targeting local searches. Marrakech specificity: our strategies systematically include optimization for interactive souk maps and real-time geolocation.

casablanca.description: Leader in e-commerce organic SEO in Casablanca, we optimize WooCommerce marketplaces. Our solutions include: product sheet optimization, SEO architecture for multi-warehouses, and integration with Moroccan ERPs. Sites benefit from a technical infrastructure optimized for SEO in Morocco with a response time < 0.5s.

rabat.description: Our organic SEO approach for institutions in Rabat combines SEO security and accessibility. We optimize government portals with: advanced semantic markup, content architecture adapted to citizen searches, and optimization for traffic peaks. items.question: What is organic SEO in Marrakech?
items.answer: Marrakech organic SEO refers to the technical and editorial optimization of a website to improve its positioning in Google results, specifically targeting local searches in Marrakech and its region.

items.question: How long does it take to see SEO results in Marrakech?
items.answer: The first results of SEO in Marrakech generally appear between 3 and 6 months. This depends on the competition of your keywords and the technical state of your site at the start.

items.question: What are the rates of an SEO agency in Marrakech?
items.answer: Rates vary according to complexity and objectives. We offer monthly packages adapted to SMEs, hotels, and local e-commerces in Marrakech.

items.question: How to optimize a site for the Marrakech market?
items.answer: Optimization for Marrakech involves bilingual (or multilingual) content, precise geolocation on Google Maps, and the use of specific keywords for the city.

items.question: Why choose a local agency in Marrakech?
items.answer: An agency in Marrakech knows the specificities of the local market, consumer behaviors, and seasonal opportunities related to tourism.

items.question: What are the differences between SEO and Google Ads?
items.answer: SEO is a lasting and organic investment (free per click), while Google Ads offers immediate but paid visibility at each click.
